mapper.select: select id, uid, name, phone, status, type, car_id, car_sn, car_model, car_model_id, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from t_car_lock_ctrl_history where id = #{id}
select id, uid, name, phone, status, type, car_id, car_sn, car_model, car_model_id, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from t_car_lock_ctrl_history limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_car_lock_ctrl_history(uid, name, phone, status, type, car_id, car_sn, car_model, car_model_id, create_time, update_time, tenant_id) values (#{uid}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{status}, #{type}, #{carId}, #{carSn}, #{carModel}, #{carModelId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{tenantId})
mapper.update:
update t_car_lock_ctrl_history
uid = #{uid},
name = #{name},
phone = #{phone},
status = #{status},
type = #{type},
car_id = #{carId},
car_sn = #{carSn},
car_model = #{carModel},
car_model_id = #{carModelId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
where id = #{id}
